A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despise the reviews\, I did go see it\, it is a SW movie\, how could I not! At first the movie\, shoked me\, surprised me\, brought me sadness\, and joy! Today\, I went to see it for a second time\, the pacing did not drag as much on the second viewing\, and the subplots make more sense! Everything has a purpose\, and I found out\, that the more I see it\, the more I like it! Do not get fooled by expectations\, go see it with an open mind\, forget what you know and you will not be disappointed! SWTLJ\, is a solid movie! It breaks new ground and takes the story farther that expected!
